mapper.update:
update bot_biz_data
NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DEFINE_ID = #{defineId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ID1 = #{id1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID2 = #{id2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID3 = #{id3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA1 = #{data1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA2 = #{data2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA3 = #{data3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA4 = #{data4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA5 = #{data5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFICATION_DATE = #{modificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bot_biz_data set NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DEFINE_ID = #{defineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ID1 = #{id1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID2 = #{id2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID3 = #{id3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA1 = #{data1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA2 = #{data2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA3 = #{data3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA4 = #{data4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA5 = #{data5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFICATION_DATE = #{modificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM BOT_BIZ_DATA ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first}, ${pageSize}

SELECT
FROM BOT_BIZ_DATA WHERE CREATION_DATE >= #{lastCreateTime} LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}

SELECT
FROM BOT_BIZ_DATA WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE > CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}

SELECT
FROM BOT_BIZ_DATA WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE >= #{lastUpdateTime} ORDER BY MODIFICATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
